<p>
  To contribute to this documentation follow the steps below. 
  Links to a detailed description of each step are provided. 
  <ul>
    <li>
      Install R and RStudio if you don't have it already.<br/>
      [Install R and RStudio Detailed Instructions](developer-how-tos_r-install.html) (Windows)
    </li>
    <li>
      Fork this project from Github and make a local clone.<br/>
      See the [Git Quickstart Guide](developer-how-tos_git-quickstart.html) for detailed instructions. 
    </li>
    <li>
      Add a new page or edit an existing page.<br/>
      [Add a New Page Detailed Instructions](developer-how-tos_add-new-page.html)
    </li>
    <li>
      Commit your update to Github.<br/>
      See the [Git Quickstart Guide](developer-how-tos_git-quickstart.html) for detailed instructions. 
    </li>
    <li>
      Createe a Github pull request.<br/>
      See the [Git Quickstart Guide](developer-how-tos_git-quickstart.html) for detailed instructions. 
    </li>
  </ul>
</p>
